Reviews.Title: Cameras are great Monitor not so much
Reviews.Author: USA earthling
Reviews.Content: I like the kit itself, very good for the job it does, but the monitors only last about a year. I have all 4 cameras set up about 31/2 years...cameras are still good, having to replace monitor for the 3rd time.

Reviews.Title: No wonder this Item is unavailible..
Reviews.Author: HamRadio-Operator
Reviews.Content: This unit worked great for 2 months. Monitor crapped out and Had installed cameras. Lucky for me I had adapters so I could adapt to another monitor.To bad, because Homeland Security 2 camera systems are no longer available. Cameras have been replaced, but monitors are still working.

ProductInfo.Features:
Easy do-it-yourself installation
See & hear from 4 cameras
Deter thieves or catch them in act!
Connects easily to a VCR for recording
Comes with 60ft (18m) cable x 4
ProductInfo.Name: Swann SW244-SK4 Retail Security Kit
